Name: Dithered
About the game: Physically place down trusses and barricades to cobble together a base. Craft new weapons to increase your firepower. Explore a pseudo procedurally generated Land. Light and maintain bonfires the same way you would in real life. Also, watch out for large migrating packs of feral creatures. Find new ways to increase the amount of resources you can acquire. Explore the dark, cold but dynamic and beautiful world of Dithered.
Meta Title: Dithered: Jan 27, 2020, Cee-Iterative and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dithered? Check out the release date (Jan 27, 2020), developer insights from Cee-Iterative, and a complete game summary.
